meanings.definition: In a complex or detailed manner
meanings.sent1: She sewed the buttons on the dress intricately.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted the mural intricately, paying attention to every small detail.
meanings.sent3: The chef intricately decorated the cake with colorful frosting swirls.
meanings.sent4: The detective unraveled the case intricately, connecting all the clues together.
meanings.sent5: The spider spun its web intricately, creating a beautiful pattern.

meanings.definition: With many interconnected parts or details
meanings.sent1: The intricately designed puzzle took hours to solve.
meanings.sent2: The antique clock had an intricately carved wooden frame.
meanings.sent3: The garden was filled with intricately shaped topiaries that resembled animals.
meanings.sent4: The map displayed an intricately drawn network of roads and rivers.
meanings.sent5: The novel's plot was intricately woven with unexpected twists and turns.
